      public void deleteEventBanner(String eventId, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Void> onSuccess, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnFailureListener onFailure)
      deletes the event banner associated with the event ID (from event_image collection)
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event, which is also the document ID of the banner image.
      onSuccess - Listener for successful deletion.
      onFailure - Listener for failed deletion.
